entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
